Package sharedRegions

Class Bench

  • java.lang.Object
    • sharedRegions.Bench
  • public class Bench
extends java.lang.Object
    Bench. It is responsible for the synchronization of the coaches, contestants and referee during the calling process and it is implemented as an implicit monitor. There are three synchronization points: one blocking point for the referee, where he waits for all contestants to be seated before starting a new trial; one blocking point for the coaches, where they wait for the referee to call a new trial; and one blocking point for the contestants, where they wait for the coach to select them to play.

      • callTrial

        public void callTrial()
        Operation callTrial. It is called by the referee to wake up the coaches to select the next team.

      • callContestants

        public void callContestants​(boolean endOfMatch)
        Operation callContestants. It is called by the coaches to select the next team and wake up the selected contestants.
        Parameters:
        endOfMatch - boolean flag that indicates if the match is over

      • followCoachAdvice

        public void followCoachAdvice()
        Operation followCoachAdvice. It is called by a contestant to follow the coach advice and stand in position.

      • seatDown

        public void seatDown()
        Operation seatDown. It is called by a contestant to seat down and wait until he is selected by the coach to play.

      • canEndTheGame

        public void canEndTheGame​(boolean endOfMatch)
        Operation canEndTheGame. It is called by the Referee to wait for all players to seat down and wake them to finish the match.
